title: To the Lighthouse - Charles interprets Mrs. Ramsay

content.prompt: Charles Tansley interprets Mrs. Ramsay’s refusal to allow him to carry her “little bag” (second sentence) as evidence of her

choices.label: desire to remain aloof from him, which he regrets

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
